alert.note: Alert for Fayette Ridges; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 10 at 10:01AM EST until March 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 7 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. Near-blizzard conditions possible in the ridges. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Pennsylvania. Portions of northern West Virginia. * WHEN...From late Friday night through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to falling and blowing snow. The strong winds and weight of snow on tree limbs may down power lines and could cause sporadic power outages. Whiteout conditions are possible and may make travel treacherous. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
